cyclone.name: GRACE
cyclone.current_location: about 60 mi (95 km) SW of Port-au-Prince, Haiti
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest away from the northeast Caribbean toward Jamaica, the Cayman Islands and eventually the Yucatan Peninsula of Mexico

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical-storm watch is posted for all of Haiti, Jamaica and portions of south-central Cuba
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical-storm warning along the southern coast of eastern Cuba and for the Cayman Islands
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Southern Haiti and Dominican Republic, Jamaica, Cayman Islands, southern Cuba, and the Yucatan Peninsula are in the projected impact swath
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected at St. Croix; breezy trade winds only.
weather_observation.rainfall: Only passing showers expected; heavy-rain core is well west of the Virgin Islands.
